snippet: Rudolph W. Giuliani’s comments on President Obama’s love of America and his upbringing have attracted an array of commentary from prominent figures in the worlds of sports, media and politics.
lead_paragraph: Rudolph W. Giuliani’s comments on President Obama’s love of America and his upbringing have attracted an array of commentary from prominent figures in the worlds of sports, media and politics.

headline.main: Giuliani Comments Draw Tweets From Martina Navratilova, Judd Apatow and Others
